description:
No battery pack, up to 400 lumens, 8 modes (4 steady and 4 flashing) and easy charging, this little light has a lot going for it. The Mini Drive 400XL packs a ton of features into its small package. The 1-button controls give you access to any of the light’s modes and it even remembers what mode it was in when you last used it. Easy USB-charging comes via the integrated plug, simply pop off the rear cover and plug your light right into any standard USB port and you’re charging, no cable needed. Small enough to keep in your bag as a “just in case” light, yet bright enough to be your go-to light.

  • 8 lighting modes, 4 in steady and 4 in flashing; steady: 400 lumens (1h), 150 lumens (2.5h), 75 lumens (5h), 15 lumens (20h), flash 1–50 lumens (13.5h), flash 2–50 lumens (13.5h), day flash–400 lumens (7h) and pulse–50 lumens (15h)
  • 1-button interface takes you through all your light’s modes
  • Mode memory remembers what mode the light was in when it was shut off
  • Cut-outs at the lens provide side illumination, keeping you seen from the side
  • Integrated USB plug means you don’t need to carry a charging cable – full charging takes about 2.5 hours
  • LED charging indicator lets you know light needs charging, when it’s charging and when it’s ready to go
  • Rugged aluminum body is durable and dissipates heat well
  • Silicone, tool-free mounting strap
  • IPX7 waterproofing protects your light from heavy downpours
name: Lezyne Mini Drive 400 Light
